name: Delfino Finance
description: Bringing a lot of people into the space of crypto and P2E for it is going to be the future. We are bringing in the following platforms for the world. Delfino finance is one of the most transformative technologies since the invention of the internet. Delfino finance stands firmly in support of financial freedom and the permission less and decentralized network. Delfino finance platform helps investors to make easy to purchase and sell their token, a blockchain ecosystem to create robust, secure, scalable and adopted payment system globally. Delfino finance is a decentralized project built on binance smart chain.
